titles.title: A bill to reduce Federal spending and the deficit by terminating taxpayer financing of presidential election campaigns and party conventions.
A bill to reduce Federal spending and the deficit by terminating taxpayer financing of presidential election campaigns and party conventions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to terminate the taxpayer election to designate $3 of income tax liability for financing of presidential election campaigns, the Presidential Election Campaign Fund, and the Presidential Primary Matching Payment Account.
